alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:00PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all area routes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Western Canyonlands
